ROMANTIC.title: Tora-dora
ROMANTIC.description: A high school story about Ryuuji and Taiga, two students with opposite personalities who team up to help each other with their crushes, only to gradually grow closer themselves. A heartwarming mix of comedy, romance, and friendship.

ROMANTIC.title: Fly me to the Moon
ROMANTIC.description: A young man falls in love at first sight and marries a mysterious girl, despite knowing almost nothing about her. Filled with cute, funny, and heartwarming moments of everyday life.

ROMANTIC.title: Re:Zero
ROMANTIC.description: Subaru Natsuki is transported to another world where he discovers he has the power to return from death, reliving moments to change outcomes. Romance, drama, and suspense are central to his journey.

ROMANTIC.title: The Girl from the Era of Tai-sei
ROMANTIC.description: A historical romantic tale about a young woman navigating the trials of love and society during the Tai-sei period. Filled with heartfelt moments and dramatic twists.

ISEKAI.title: Reincarnation of jobless
ISEKAI.description: A man dies and is reborn in a fantasy world with a chance to fix his past mistakes. Focuses on magic, adventure, and the personal growth of the main character.

ISEKAI.title: About how I became a slime
ISEKAI.description: The main character dies and is reincarnated as a slime in a fantasy world, gradually gaining powers and building his own kingdom. A fun blend of humor, action, and world-building.

ISEKAI.title: The World's Most Dangerous Assassin Reincarnated as an Aristocrat
ISEKAI.description: A highly skilled assassin dies and is reborn as a noble in a fantasy world. He must adapt his deadly skills to aristocratic life while facing new challenges and intrigue.

ACTION.title: Attack on Titan
ACTION.description: Humanity fights for survival against giant humanoid Titans. Epic battles, political intrigue, and intense drama define this action-packed series.

ACTION.title: Demon Slayer
ACTION.description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to save his sister and avenge his family. Stunning fight scenes, emotional depth, and powerful bonds drive the story.

ACTION.title: Sword Art Online
ACTION.description: Players become trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG and must fight to survive. Adventure, romance, and high-stakes battles create an immersive experience.

MYSTERY.title: Death Note
MYSTERY.description: Light Yagami finds a notebook that kills anyone whose name is written in it. A thrilling battle of wits between genius minds unfolds.

MYSTERY.title: Detective Already Dead
MYSTERY.description: A young detective teams up with a legendary deceased investigator to solve mysterious cases. Suspense, intrigue, and clever deductions fill the story.

FANTASY.title: My Unique Pick: Made in Abyss
FANTASY.description: A young girl descends into a mysterious, dangerous abyss to find her mother, discovering strange creatures and ancient relics. Emotional depth, adventure, and stunning world-building.
